test.query: select uniq(number) from (select DISTINCT number from numbers(100000000)) SETTINGS optimize_uniq_to_count=1
select uniq(number) from (select number from numbers(100000000) group by number) SETTINGS optimize_uniq_to_count=1
select uniq(number) from (select DISTINCT number from numbers(100000000)) SETTINGS allow_experimental_analyzer=1, optimize_uniq_to_count=1
select uniq(number) from (select number from numbers(100000000) group by number) SETTINGS allow_experimental_analyzer=1, optimize_uniq_to_count=1
